languages.text: {n}Вокс центрального черепа коротко щелкает, а после начинает стрекотать самописное устройство второго. В вашу руку падает короткая записка:{/n} "Зафиксирована возможность пробуждения машинных духов священного механизма. Ожидаю подтверждения от хозяина единицы {petname}".

{n}The central skull's vox clicks briefly, and chittering sounds come from another skull's hurrying quill. A short note falls into your hand:{/n} "Recording a possibility to awaken the sacred mechanism's machine spirits. Awaiting confirmation from Unit {petname}'s owner."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс центрального черепа коротко щелкает, а после начинает стрекотать самописное устройство второго. В вашу руку падает короткая записка:{/n} "Зафиксирована возможность пробуждения машинных духов священного механизма. Ожидаю подтверждения от хозяина единицы {petname}".

traits.locale_text: {n}The central skull's vox clicks briefly, and scratching sounds come from the scribe skull's hurrying auto-quill. A short note falls into your hand:{/n} "Recording a possibility to awaken the sacred mechanism's machine spirits. Awaiting confirmation from Unit {petname}'s owner."

{n}The central skull's vox clicks briefly, and scratching sounds come from the scribe skull's hurrying auto-quill. A short note falls into your hand:{/n} "Recording a possibility to awaken the sacred mechanism's machine spirits. Awaiting confirmation from Unit {petname}'s owner."

{n}The central skull's vox clicks briefly, and scratching sounds come from the scribe skull's hurrying auto-quill. A short note falls into your hand:{/n} "Recording a possibility to awaken the sacred mechanism's machine spirits. Awaiting confirmation from Unit {petname}'s owner."

{n}The central skull's vox clicks briefly, and scratching sounds come from the scribe skull's hurrying auto-quill. A short note falls into your hand:{/n} "Recording a possibility to awaken the sacred mechanism's machine spirits. Awaiting confirmation from Unit {petname}'s owner."

{n}The central skull's vox clicks briefly, and chittering sounds come from another skull's hurrying quill. A short note falls into your hand:{/n} "Recording a possibility to awaken the sacred mechanism's machine spirits. Awaiting confirmation from Unit {petname}'s owner."

{n}The central skull's vox clicks briefly, and chittering sounds come from another skull's hurrying quill. A short note falls into your hand:{/n} "Recording a possibility to awaken the sacred mechanism's machine spirits. Awaiting confirmation from Unit {petname}'s owner."

languages.text: {n}Das Vox des mittleren Servoschädels klickt kurz, und die hurtige Feder eines anderen Schädels verursacht ein zwitscherndes Geräusch. Dann fällt eine kurze Nachricht in deine Hand:{/n} "Erfasse eine Möglichkeit, die Maschinengeister des heiligen Mechanismus wiederzuerwecken. Erwarte Bestätigung von {mf|Besitzer|Besitzerin} der Einheit {petname}."
languages.original_text: {n}The central skull's vox clicks briefly, and chittering sounds come from another skull's hurrying quill. A short note falls into your hand:{/n} "Recording a possibility to awaken the sacred mechanism's machine spirits. Awaiting confirmation from Unit {petname}'s owner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Vox des mittleren Servoschädels klickt kurz, und die hurtige Feder eines anderen Schädels verursacht ein zwitscherndes Geräusch. Dann fällt eine kurze Nachricht in deine Hand:{/n} "Erfasse eine Möglichkeit, die Maschinengeister des heiligen Mechanismus wiederzuerwecken. Erwarte Bestätigung von {mf|Besitzer|Besitzerin} der Einheit {petname}."

languages.text: {n}Un bref cliquetis émane du vox du crâne central, suivi des grattements rapides de la plume d'un autre crâne. Un message succinct tombe dans votre main :{/n} « Possibilité de réveiller les esprits de la machine du mécanisme sacré. En attente de la confirmation {mf|du|de la} propriétaire de l'unité {petname}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The central skull's vox clicks briefly, and chittering sounds come from another skull's hurrying quill. A short note falls into your hand:{/n} "Recording a possibility to awaken the sacred mechanism's machine spirits. Awaiting confirmation from Unit {petname}'s owner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un bref cliquetis émane du vox du crâne central, suivi des grattements rapides de la plume d'un autre crâne. Un message succinct tombe dans votre main :{/n} « Possibilité de réveiller les esprits de la machine du mécanisme sacré. En attente de la confirmation {mf|du|de la} propriétaire de l'unité {petname}. »

{n}Un bref cliquetis émane du vox du crâne central, suivi des grattements rapides de la plume du crâne-scribe. Un message succinct tombe dans votre main :{/n} « Possibilité de réveiller les esprits de la machine du mécanisme sacré. En attente de la confirmation {mf|du|de la} propriétaire de l'unité {petname}. »

languages.text: {n}中间的伺服头骨音阵装置发出了短暂的“咔哒”声，另一颗头骨的羽毛笔发出了急促的“沙沙”声。随后，一张简短的羊皮纸卷落入你的手中。{/n}“检测到了神圣机器，或许可以唤醒这台机器的机魂，正在等待{petname}这个单位的主人进行确认。”
languages.original_text: {n}The central skull's vox clicks briefly, and chittering sounds come from another skull's hurrying quill. A short note falls into your hand:{/n} "Recording a possibility to awaken the sacred mechanism's machine spirits. Awaiting confirmation from Unit {petname}'s owner."

traits.locale_text: {n}中间的伺服头骨音阵装置发出了短暂的“咔哒”声，另一颗头骨的羽毛笔发出了急促的“沙沙”声。随后，一张简短的羊皮纸卷落入你的手中。{/n}“检测到了神圣机器，或许可以唤醒这台机器的机魂，正在等待{petname}这个单位的主人进行确认。”
{n}中间的伺服头骨音阵装置发出了短暂的“咔哒”声，缮写头骨的羽毛笔发出了急促的刮擦声。随后，一张简短的羊皮纸卷落入你的手中。{/n}“检测到了神圣机器，或许可以唤醒这台机器的机魂，正在等待{petname}这个单位的主人进行确认。”

languages.text: {n}El voco del cráneo central chasca y la veloz pluma de un segundo cráneo produce una serie de sonidos. Una nota escueta cae sobre tu mano:{/n} «Registrando la posibilidad de despertar a los espíritus máquina del sagrado mecanismo. Esperando confirmación de{mf|l amo| la ama} de la unidad {petname}».
languages.original_text: {n}The central skull's vox clicks briefly, and chittering sounds come from another skull's hurrying quill. A short note falls into your hand:{/n} "Recording a possibility to awaken the sacred mechanism's machine spirits. Awaiting confirmation from Unit {petname}'s owner."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco del cráneo central chasca y la veloz pluma de un segundo cráneo produce una serie de sonidos. Una nota escueta cae sobre tu mano:{/n} «Registrando la posibilidad de despertar a los espíritus máquina del sagrado mecanismo. Esperando confirmación de{mf|l amo| la ama} de la unidad {petname}».

languages.text: {n}中心にあるスカルのヴォクスがカチッと鳴り、他のスカルの羽ペンが慌ただしく紙を擦る音が響いた。短いメモがあなたの手に滑り込んだ。{/n}「聖なる機械の機械精霊を覚醒させる可能性を記録中。ユニット・{petname}のオーナーの確認を待機中」
languages.original_text: {n}The central skull's vox clicks briefly, and chittering sounds come from another skull's hurrying quill. A short note falls into your hand:{/n} "Recording a possibility to awaken the sacred mechanism's machine spirits. Awaiting confirmation from Unit {petname}'s owner."

traits.locale_text: {n}中心にあるスカルのヴォクスがカチッと鳴り、書記のスカルの羽ペンが慌ただしく紙を擦る音が響いた。短いメモがあなたの手に滑り込んだ。{/n}「聖なる機械の機械精霊を覚醒させる可能性を記録中。ユニット・{petname}のオーナーの確認を待機中」
{n}中心にあるスカルのヴォクスがカチッと鳴り、書記のスカルの羽ペンが慌ただしく紙を擦る音が響いた。短いメモがあなたの手に滑り込んだ。{/n}「聖なる機械の機械精霊を覚醒させる可能性を記録中。ユニット・{petname}のオーナーの確認を待機中」

languages.text: {n}Ana hizmeletin voksu tiz bir ses çıkarıyor, başka bir hizmeletin telaşlı tüy kalemi kâğıdı tırmalarken avucuna kısa bir not düşüyor.{/n} "Kutsal mekanizmanın makine ruhlarını uyandırma ihtimali kaydedildi. {petname} Birimi sahibinden onay bekleniyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The central skull's vox clicks briefly, and chittering sounds come from another skull's hurrying quill. A short note falls into your hand:{/n} "Recording a possibility to awaken the sacred mechanism's machine spirits. Awaiting confirmation from Unit {petname}'s owner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ana hizmeletin voksu tiz bir ses çıkarıyor, başka bir hizmeletin telaşlı tüy kalemi kâğıdı tırmalarken avucuna kısa bir not düşüyor:{/n} "Kutsal mekanizmanın makine ruhlarını uyandırma ihtimali kaydedildi. {petname} Birimi sahibinden onay bekleniyor."

{n}Ana hizmeletin voksu kısaca tıkırdar, kâtip hizmeletin telaşlı tüy kalemi kâğıdı tırmalarken avucuna kısa bir not düşer:{/n} "Kutsal mekanizmanın makine ruhlarını uyandırma ihtimali kaydedildi. {petname} Birimi sahibinden onay bekleniyor."
